A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not saying that Star wars is known for explaining the science and whys behind a lot of things\, but this installment adds so many questions to how common sense worked a long ago and far far away. The Resistance thinks and makes decisions like teenagers in a bad horror film\, and First Order generals go from being reprimanded for failure to being praised over for apparently inventing new technology on the spot over the course of 5 minutes. \nAfter this one my only hope for the next film is that at least one writer for the next film will visit a Star Wars wiki page.
